title: [K-12] Collaborative Strategies for International and Local Students to Build Multicultural Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online collaboration tools, foundational understanding of multicultural communication
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, utilizing both real-time video conferencing and asynchronous collaboration platforms

learning_goals: Learners can build learning networks with at least three cross-cultural peers within two weeks.
Learners can design and execute at least two informal social interaction activities over four weeks.
Learners achieve over 85% project completion rates by creating collaboration roadmaps that account for cultural differences.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
